remixlab.bias.agent.profile

Class MotionProfile<A extends Action<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.agent.profile.Profile<ButtonShortcut,A>
      • remixlab.bias.agent.profile.MotionProfile<A>
  • Type Parameters:
    A - Action : User-defined action.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable

    public class MotionProfile<A extends Action<?>>
extends Profile<ButtonShortcut,A>
    A Profile defining a mapping between ButtonShortcuts and user-defined Actions.
